title: DDM OS Reminder (org.churchofjesuschrist.dorm)
description: Configures DDM OS Reminder message preferences

ScriptLog.title: Script Log Path
ScriptLog.description: Path to the log file for the DDM reminder script.

DaysBeforeDeadlineDisplayReminder.title: Days Before Deadline: Display Reminder
DaysBeforeDeadlineDisplayReminder.description: Number of days before the deadline when reminders start being displayed.

DaysBeforeDeadlineBlurscreen.title: Days Before Deadline: Blur Screen
DaysBeforeDeadlineBlurscreen.description: Number of days before the deadline when blur-screen enforcement starts.

DaysBeforeDeadlineHidingButton2.title: Days Before Deadline: Hide Defer Button
DaysBeforeDeadlineHidingButton2.description: Number of days before the deadline when the secondary button is hidden.

DaysOfExcessiveUptimeWarning.title: Days of Excessive Uptime Warning
DaysOfExcessiveUptimeWarning.description: Number of days of excessive uptime before warning the user.

MinimumDiskFreePercentage.title: Minimum Disk Free Percentage
MinimumDiskFreePercentage.description: Percent of free disk space required before warning the user.

MeetingDelay.title: Meeting Delay (Minutes)
MeetingDelay.description: Delay in minutes before enforcing reminders around meetings.

AcceptableAssertionApplicationNames.title: Acceptable Assertion Application Names
AcceptableAssertionApplicationNames.description: Space-delimited list of application name substrings used to allowlist display sleep assertions; matching assertions defer reminders up to the Meeting Delay.

OrganizationOverlayIconURL.title: Organization Overlay Icon URL
OrganizationOverlayIconURL.description: URL to the organization overlay icon image.

OrganizationOverlayIconURLdark.title: Organization Overlay Icon URL (Dark Mode)
OrganizationOverlayIconURLdark.description: URL to the organization overlay icon image used when the interface is in Dark Mode. Falls back to OrganizationOverlayIconURL when unset.

SwapOverlayAndLogo.title: Swap Overlay And Logo
SwapOverlayAndLogo.description: Whether to swap the overlay icon and primary logo positions.

DateFormatDeadlineHumanReadable.title: Deadline Date Format (Human Readable)
DateFormatDeadlineHumanReadable.description: strftime format string used to render the deadline date for users.

SupportTeamName.title: Support Team Name
SupportTeamName.description: Display name of the support team.

InfoButtonAction.title: Info Button Action URL
InfoButtonAction.description: URL opened when the info button is clicked.

SupportKBURL.title: Support KB Markdown Link
SupportKBURL.description: Markdown-formatted link to the support knowledge base article.

Title.title: Dialog Title
Title.description: Title text displayed at the top of the DDM dialog.

Button1Text.title: Primary Button Text
Button1Text.description: Label for the primary action button.

Button2Text.title: Secondary Button Text
Button2Text.description: Label for the secondary (remind later) button.

ExcessiveUptimeWarningMessage.title: Excessive Uptime Warning Message
ExcessiveUptimeWarningMessage.default: **Note:** Your Mac has been powered-on for **{uptimeHumanReadable}**. For more reliable results, please manually restart your Mac before proceeding.
ExcessiveUptimeWarningMessage.description: Markdown-formatted text displayed in the dialog.

DiskSpaceWarningMessage.title: Disk Space Warning Message
DiskSpaceWarningMessage.default: **Note:** Your Mac has only **{diskSpaceHumanReadable}**, which may prevent this macOS {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l}.
DiskSpaceWarningMessage.description: Markdown-formatted text displayed in the dialog.

StagedUpdateMessage.title: Staged Update Message
StagedUpdateMessage.default: **Good news!** The macOS {ddmVersionString} update has already been downloaded to your Mac and is ready to install. Installation will proceed quickly when you click **{button1text}**.
StagedUpdateMessage.description: Markdown-formatted message displayed when the update is fully staged (downloaded and ready).

PartiallyStagedUpdateMessage.title: Partially Staged Update Message
PartiallyStagedUpdateMessage.default: Your Mac has begun downloading and preparing required macOS update components. Installation will be quicker once all assets have finished staging.
PartiallyStagedUpdateMessage.description: Markdown-formatted message displayed when the update is partially staged (preparing).

PendingDownloadMessage.title: Pending Download Message
PendingDownloadMessage.default: Your Mac will begin downloading the update shortly.
PendingDownloadMessage.description: Markdown-formatted message displayed when the update download is pending.

HideStagedUpdateInfo.title: Hide Staged Update Info
HideStagedUpdateInfo.description: Whether to hide staged update information (e.g., staged/partial/pending messages) in the UI.

Message.title: Dialog Message
Message.default:
**A required macOS {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l} is now available**

Happy {weekday}, {loggedInUserFirstname}!

Please {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l} to macOS **{ddmVersionString}** to ensure your Mac remains secure and compliant with organizational policies.{updateReadyMessage}

To perform the {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l} now, click **{button1text}**, review the on-screen instructions, then click **{softwareUpdateButtonText}**.

If you are unable to perform this {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l} now, click **{button2text}** to be reminded again later (which is disabled when the deadline is imminent).

However, your device **will automatically restart and {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l}** on **{ddmEnforcedInstallDateHumanReadable}** if you have not {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l}d before the deadline.{excessiveUptimeWarningMessage}{diskSpaceWarningMessage}

For assistance, please contact **{supportTeamName}** by clicking the (?) button in the bottom, right-hand corner.
Message.description: Markdown-formatted message body displayed in the dialog.

InfoBox.title: Info Box Content
InfoBox.default:
**Current:** macOS {installedmacOSVersion}

**Required:** macOS {ddmVersionString}

**Deadline:** {ddmVersionStringDeadlineHumanReadable}

**Day(s) Remaining:** {ddmVersionStringDaysRemaining}

**Last Restart:** {uptimeHumanReadable}

**Free Disk Space:** {diskSpaceHumanReadable}
InfoBox.description: Markdown-formatted info box content showing current and required versions and deadline.

HelpMessage.title: Help Message
HelpMessage.default:
For assistance, please contact: **{supportTeamName}**
- **Telephone:** {supportTeamPhone}
- **Email:** {supportTeamEmail}
- **Website:** {supportTeamWebsite}
- **Knowledge Base Article:** {supportKBURL}

**User Information:**
- **Full Name:** {userfullname}
- **User Name:** {username}

**Computer Information:**
- **Computer Name:** {computername}
- **Serial Number:** {serialnumber}
- **macOS:** {osversion}

**Script Information:**
- **Dialog:** {dialogVersion}
- **Script:** {scriptVersion}
HelpMessage.description: Markdown-formatted help text including support, user, and computer information.

HelpImage.title: Help Image
HelpImage.description: Help image configuration, such as QR code pointing to the info button action.
